title: Banned without warning/mute and there was no discriminating evidence provided in the in game logs?
body:
Umm, this acc just got 14 day suspension after not having any warnings/mute disciplinary actions having been taken on the acc. Further more the reasons I got banned I feel wasnt justified, especially the info presented... The entire first game all of the flame I could have possible been reported for was me telling the other team what the toxic players on my team said, these were also in quotation marks.

14 day suspension for asking the opposing team to report two players on my team who were calling me and my teammate "%%%%%%s cause youre bad, or dropped on your head as a baby".

replies.body:
Hi Karma x Sivir,

I've had a quick look through your chatlogs - I'm not sure if you were sent the correct logs as it is very clear on my end where your negative behaviour was. Would you be open to sharing what you were sent in your ban email so we can discuss? Otherwise with your permission I will share the logs that I have.
can you post every chat log ive been reported in leading up to my ban?

Hi Bright Dusty,

You would have received emails with the logs each time you were punished for you to review.

For your particular case, I suggest you reach out to support.riotgames.com and submit a ticket if you want to discuss your ban any further as the number of punishments you've received is quite extensive.
Post the chat logs then. If theres no discriminating evidence. ðŸ¤”
